## Anthropogenic effects on chungungo's abundance

Here we will explore some anthropogenic variables as potential drivers os abundance change on this species

```{r data}
#loading libraries
library(mgcv)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(pbkrtest)
library(MuMIn)

#loading data
data<-read.table("data/data.txt", header = T)
attach(data)
```

To do this, we will use a Poisson GLMM, using site and sampling month as random factors.

```{r model1}
mod1<-glmer(abund~people+boats+pets+algae+(1|site)+(1|month), family = "poisson")
summary(mod1)
```
